### Load the data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

data_dir <- "../data"

# if ../data doesn't exist, create it
if( !dir.exists(data_dir) ){
  dir.create(path = data_dir)
}

# write data as .csv 
kidney_disease <- "../_raw/kidney_disease.csv" |> 
  read_csv() |>
  write_csv("../data/01_data_load.csv")
```
